participant_1.background:
I make sure my family is well-provided for, even though I'm not very tall.
i m an only child.
my favorite band is the beastie boys.
i am enrolled in several college credit courses.
I can't resist a good salad from Aldi when I'm on the go.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy going outside to collect mushrooms, and my family is very supportive of this interest.
i am almost finished with my degree.
i have two pitt bulls.
i use to be a huge superman fan as a child.
i sing in the church choir every sunday.

content.text: Hi there! I'm in the middle of getting ready to go to the store. What are you up to today?
I'm working on a research project for my degree. What do you like to get at the store?
I usually get a salad from Aldi. I'm an only child and my parents always made sure I was well-provided for. I'm enrolled in several college credit courses right now.
That's great! I'm almost finished with my degree. I have two pitt bulls and we like to go for walks in the forest. I used to be a huge superman fan as a child.
That's awesome! I love pitt bulls. I used to sing in the church choir every Sunday. I'm a huge fan of the Beastie Boys.
Wow! We have a lot in common. I'm also a fan of the Beastie Boys. What are your favorite songs?
My favorite song is "Sabotage". It's so catchy! What's yours?
"No Sleep Till Brooklyn" is my favorite. I love the beat and the lyrics.
Those are both great songs! I'm glad we can relate to each other.
Me too! We should get together sometime and have a jam session.
That would be fun! I'll bring my bass guitar.
